title: Screen FLashing
body: When i get into loading screen and in game my screen will flash on and off whenever movement occurs. Im using an i3 m370 and an Nvidia 520m. Ive tried the borderless fix but that screws up my fps. Please help me!

replies.body:
I'm inclined to say this is most likely caused by a display driver or hardware issue. I recommend working through our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure all local configurations around your display are good to go.

Let me know if this caused any sort of noticeable change.
I ended up resetting my laptop and reinstalled everything and it was fixed thanks for ur help
